transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ji Rajesh sir bataiye main Hemant baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapne abhi hamari customer care number pe call kiya tha main Rahul ka senior manager baat kar raha hu. Suno to Rahul se baat hui thi aapki. Bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan uske baad ye bas issue ek to naam change karwana tha.
Executive: Awaaz nahi aa rahi?
Customer: Naam change karwana tha naam.
Executive: Naam change karwana tha?
Customer: Haan wo Narayana trading company ki jagah Narayana fabrication fitting karwana tha.
Executive: Ek minute sir awaaz nahi aa rahi thoda sa phone paas mein karke boliye sir.
Customer: Paas hai ye bilkul yaar.
Executive: Haan awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan boliye sir kya change karana hai?
Customer: Aapki sahi nahi aa rahi awaaz.
Executive: Achcha mere side se nahi aa rahi. Achcha ek minute rukiye. Rajesh sir ab aa rahi hai awaaz?
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Achcha dobara karta hu fir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change the company name.



Resolution:

- Executive is having trouble hearing the customer.
- Executive will call again.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- name change, company name, technical issue
